text:
Weight-loss pills can help. So why don't more people use them?

"I think a lot of physicians are uncomfortable prescribing weight loss medications," one endocrinologist said. "Fen-phen scares off a lot of them.”
title: Weight-loss pills can help. So why don't more people use them?
